text: 2 State ab c$ TR 0 33 glg 1 a 2 rlrl 3 s3s41313 g5 g2 4 s3 — g6 5 s7 6 1å rå 7 20 Fig. 226 SLR table for Grammar 2.9 stack := empty ; push(0,stack) ; read(input) 100p case table[top(stack), input] of shift s: push(input,stack) ; push(s,stack) ; read(input) reduce p: n := the left-hand side of production p ; r := the number of symbols on the right-hand side of p ; pop 2+r elements from the stack ; let go s = table[top(stack),n]; push(n,stack) ; push(s, stack) accept: — terminate with success error reportError ena100p Fig.227 Algorithm for SLR parsing
